gt_text: その扉を開けて 深く息を吸って 自分の世界を離れ 他人の世界へ踏み出す
juding_criteria:
Here is a bullet list of required visual elements:

*   Four concrete steps
*   Old library building/entrance
*   Graffiti-style text '推开那扇门' on the first (lowest) step
*   Graffiti-style text '深吸一口气' on the second step
*   Graffiti-style text '离开你的世界' on the third step
*   Graffiti-style text '进入别人的世界' on the fourth (topmost) step
*   Worn hardcover book resting on the top step
*   Faded, illegible title on the book
